meanings.definition: A salt in which only part of the hydrogen of a polybasic acid has been replaced by a metal.
meanings.english_definition: A salt in which only part of the hydrogen of a polybasic acid has been replaced by a metal.

examples.translation: 硫酸水素ナトリウムは重塩です。

etymology.value: From 'bi-' (meaning two or twice) and 'salt', indicating that the salt contains two equivalents of the acid radical to one of the base.
